ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work is supported by Jiangxi key project of scientific and technological innovation talents (“5511”project) (20171BCB18001), First-class discipline project of Jiangxi province: study on the regulation of neurological diseases by the essential oil of traditional Chinese medicine into the brain via olfactory pathway (JXSYLXK-ZHYA0092) and study on the curative effect of self-made refreshing and refreshing essential oil through sniffing pathway (JXSYLXK-ZHYA0091).
